title: New: LANY – Where The Hell Are My Friends
content:
I adore Someone Else, one of the tracks that LA trio LANY released last year.

Combining all the best elements of 90’s boyband pop, with a slick, modern twist, it’s no surprise that the group inked a deal with Polydor, and are gearing up for an even bigger year. New single, Where The Hell Are My Friends, is another slice of upbeat pop perfection; perfectly primed for a summer of festivals. Check it out below.

Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
